title: 3D Printable Robotics
description: This project-based, systems engineering course explores robotics in the context of next-generation layered manufacturing techniques (3D printing). Students will design, model, simulate, optimize, 3D print, test, and refine a remotely controllable robotic system as member of a multidisciplinary team. Recommended preparation: students should have experience with computer aided design (CAD). Prerequisites: graduate standing.
